sentence:
Along with the deliberations of the research team, the emerging CMOCs were also scrutinised and further refined by members of the CEG.Results
Search results
The results of the search process are shown in the flow chart Fig. 1.
Altogether, 1171 papers were scrutinised, using the inclusion criteria stated in Fig. 1, for potential inclusion in the review.

In the specific area of this review, we have considered permission in relation to hearing-related communication (see Fig. 2), but the mechanism that underpins our concept of permission may be present and ‘triggerable’ in many areas of long-term care.

Along with the deliberations of the research team, the emerging CMOCs were also scrutinised and further refined by members of the CEG.Results
